column1: Kicked off the Monroe County Bicentennial Celebration at the Tompkinsville National Guard Armory. Happy 200th Birthday 🎂 to my home county! #KY1 https://t.co/gqGd9l6QRj

I support #CriminalJusticeReform because of racial/social injustice & excessive sentences for minor drug convictions. However Kentucky must move beyond skyrocketing incarceration rates pardons for the politically connected & tax increases for new jails. KY has a long way to go!
Discussed #ImpeachmentTrial on CNN @CuomoPrimeTime https://t.co/j31uSGmC2W

Senate just passed #USMCA. Yesterday @realDonaldTrump signed Phase I of #ChinaTradeDeal. Productive week in Washington for the Prez and Congressional Republicans...and yet the Democrats are still obsessed with their #ImpeachmentScam! https://t.co/3jTWDh30XZ

Joined Kelli Pendleton in the Pentagon at her installation ceremony as the new Civilian Aide to the Secretary of the @USArmy. Kelli is a tireless advocate for our troops veterans @hccchamber & @FortCampbell. #KY1 https://t.co/ksOawJxooW
Reaffirmed my strong support of the #2ndAmendment & recognized the grassroots movement sweeping across Kentucky fiscal courts to protect #gunrights. #KY1 https://t.co/liU5SBOMys

Just finished ‘The Nearly Forgotten History of Portland Kentucky’ by my friend & #KY1 native @jimhigdon on my flight back to DC. If you’re a Kentucky history buff then I highly recommend. https://t.co/7z0mRgCaYo
TJ & I joined hundreds of great Kentuckians to honor @DanielCameronAG on the eve of his official swearing in as Attorney General. https://t.co/hlc28PmbYy
Enjoyed the @WKUBasketball game with some fine #KY1 friends from Clinton Monroe & Russell Counties. @wku beat Rice in a great 🏀 game! https://t.co/y410wLh1vL
Here is a summary of our work in 2019. I appreciate my team and all of their hard work. I’m also very thankful for the honor of serving #KY1 in Washington. https://t.co/aJt30vJFl0
Discussed #ImpeachmentHearings and #BidenCorruption on @FoxNews Fox and Friends First this morning with @HeatherChilders. The last half of my interview: #KY1 https://t.co/2jqYVlFYpE

What a difference a day makes! Today we passed #USMCA. This bipartisan compromise was supported by business & labor. It’s good for workers manufacturers & farmers. A priority bill for me my Floor remarks are below: #KY1 https://t.co/Pw47Mjpr0Y
My House Floor speech against #impeachment. “I wholeheartedly OPPOSE these baseless articles of impeachment against President Trump.” #KY1 https://t.co/NGTw6saeHB
